statements: SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE fixture_id = 1;
SELECT fixture_id, last_maintenance_date FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE next_maintenance_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT next_maintenance_date, fixture_id FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE alert_threshold > 10;
SELECT fixture_id, last_maintenance_date, next_maintenance_date FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE last_maintenance_date < '2021-12-01' ORDER BY fixture_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE alert_threshold BETWEEN 5 AND 15;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE last_maintenance_date < '2022-01-01' AND alert_threshold > 10 ORDER BY next_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT fixture_id, next_maintenance_date FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE alert_threshold < 5;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE next_maintenance_date < '2023-01-01' OR alert_threshold = 10 ORDER BY last_maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT fixture_id, last_maintenance_date FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE last_maintenance_date = '2021-12-31';
SELECT fixture_id, last_maintenance_date, next_maintenance_date FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE alert_threshold BETWEEN 5 AND 15 ORDER BY fixture_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule;
SELECT fixture_id, last_maintenance_date, next_maintenance_date FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE alert_sent = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule ORDER BY next_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT fixture_id, last_maintenance_date, next_maintenance_date, alert_sent FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE fixture_id = 1;
SELECT fixture_id, last_maintenance_date, next_maintenance_date, alert_sent FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE next_maintenance_date < CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC
SELECT fixture_id, next_maintenance_date FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE alert_sent = TRUE
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE next_maintenance_date < '2022-01-01'
SELECT fixture_id, last_maintenance_date FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE alert_sent = FALSE ORDER BY fixture_id
SELECT fixture_id, next_maintenance_date FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE last_maintenance_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT * FROM smart_light_fixtures;
SELECT fixture_id, location, last_maintenance_date FROM smart_light_fixtures;
SELECT fixture_id, location FROM smart_light_fixtures WHERE location = 'Hallway';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT fixture_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE fixture_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM smart_light_fixtures;
SELECT fixture_id, location, last_maintenance_date FROM smart_light_fixtures WHERE location = 'Living Room';
SELECT fixture_id, location, last_maintenance_date FROM smart_light_fixtures ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT f.fixture_id, f.location, s.maintenance_type, s.maintenance_date FROM smart_light_fixtures f JOIN maintenance_schedule s ON f.fixture_id = s.fixture_id;

SELECT f.location, s.maintenance_type, a.alert_type FROM smart_light_fixtures f JOIN maintenance_schedule s ON f.fixture_id = s.fixture_id JOIN maintenance_alerts a ON s.schedule_id = a.schedule_id WHERE s.maintenance_type = 'Routine Check';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule;
SELECT fixture_id, location, model FROM fixture;
SELECT alert_type, alert_description, alert_date FROM alert WHERE alert_type = 'Maintenance Required';
SELECT description, maintenance_date FROM maintenance_schedule ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM replacement_schedule WHERE reason LIKE '%wear%' ORDER BY replacement_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT fixture_id, location, model FROM fixture WHERE last_maintenance_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT alert_id, alert_type, alert_description FROM alert WHERE alert_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-03-01 23:59:59';
SELECT * FROM replacement_schedule WHERE reason LIKE '%wear%' ORDER BY replacement_date ASC;
SELECT m.*, f.location, rs.replacement_date FROM maintenance_schedule m JOIN fixture f ON m.fixture_id = f.fixture_id JOIN replacement_schedule rs ON m.fixture_id = rs.fixture_id;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule;
SELECT fixture_id, last_maintenance_date FROM maintenance_schedule ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT fixture_name, location FROM fixtures WHERE installation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM alert_log WHERE alert_type = 'Maintenance';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC, next_maintenance_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT fixture_name, location FROM fixtures WHERE installation_date > '2022-01-01' AND location IN ('Room A', 'Room B');
SELECT alert_date, alert_type, alert_message FROM alert_log WHERE alert_type = 'Critical' ORDER BY alert_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT fixture_name, installation_date FROM fixtures JOIN maintenance_schedule ON fixtures.fixture_id = maintenance_schedule.fixture_id WHERE alert_threshold > 3;
SELECT username, email, phone_number FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%' ORDER BY username ASC;
